title.rendered: Around the World in Eighty Days

content.rendered:
Jaico illustarted classics series is a collection of beloved children’s classics read by generations all over the world. Rich with adventures and thrills, these immortal stories with vivid illustrations are designed to delight young readers.

Phileas Fogy, a wealthy Londoner, was a member of the Reform Club. He was also slightly eccentric. His friends at the club challenged him for 20,000 pounds to go around the world in eighty days. He accepted the wager and set out from London with his belongings.

Did he win the wager?

Come, let us join Phileas Fogy on his tour and find out.
